Classes/TwitchPlayer/PlayerTheme.html.name: PlayerTheme
Classes/TwitchPlayer/PlayerTheme.html.abstract: PlayerTheme specifies the potential color themes of a Twitch Player instance.

Classes/TwitchPlayer/ChatDisplayMode.htm.name: ChatDisplayMode
Classes/TwitchPlayer/ChatDisplayMode.htm.abstract: ChatDisplayMode specifies the types of Chat display methods there are for Twitch chat.

Classes/TwitchPlayer/PlayerChatFontSize..name: PlayerChatFontSize
Classes/TwitchPlayer/PlayerChatFontSize..abstract: PlayerChatFontSize specifies the different sizes of fonts that are available for Twitch players.

Classes/TwitchPlayer/PlayerLayout.html.name: PlayerLayout
Classes/TwitchPlayer/PlayerLayout.html.abstract: PlayerLayout specifies the different types of layouts that are available for an embedded Twitch Player.

Classes/TwitchPlayer.html#/c:@M@TwitchPl.name: allowsFullScreen
Classes/TwitchPlayer.html#/c:@M@TwitchPl.abstract: allowsFullScreen is a settable variable that determines if the Twitch Player allows full screen.

Classes/TwitchPlayer.html#/s:12TwitchPla.name: chatMode
Classes/TwitchPlayer.html#/s:12TwitchPla.abstract: chatMode is a settable variable that determines the mode of the chat display for the Twitch Player.

Classes/TwitchPlayer.html#/s:12TwitchPla.name: playerLayout
Classes/TwitchPlayer.html#/s:12TwitchPla.abstract: playerLayout is a settable variable that determines the layout of the Twitch Player.

Classes/TwitchPlayer.html#/s:12TwitchPla.name: playerTheme
Classes/TwitchPlayer.html#/s:12TwitchPla.abstract: playerTheme is a settable variable that determines if the Web Player allows full screen.

Classes/TwitchPlayer.html#/c:@M@TwitchPl.name: init(frame:configuration:)
Classes/TwitchPlayer.html#/c:@M@TwitchPl.abstract: Initializes a TwitchPlayer with the specified frame and configuration.

Classes/TwitchPlayer.html#/s:12TwitchPla.name: setVolume(to:)
Classes/TwitchPlayer.html#/s:12TwitchPla.abstract: setVolume sets the volume level of the Twitch Player to the input value.

Classes/TwitchClipPlayer/PreloadSettings.abstract: PreloadSettings defines the different types of settings that are available

Classes/TwitchClipPlayer.html#/c:@M@Twit.name: clipId
Classes/TwitchClipPlayer.html#/c:@M@Twit.abstract: clipId is a settable variable that determines which clip will be loaded in this clip player. Default: ""

Classes/TwitchClipPlayer.html#/c:@M@Twit.name: autoPlayEnabled
Classes/TwitchClipPlayer.html#/c:@M@Twit.abstract: autoPlayEnabled is a settable variable that determines if a Twitch Clip Player plays automatically upon

Classes/TwitchClipPlayer.html#/c:@M@Twit.name: muteOnLoad
Classes/TwitchClipPlayer.html#/c:@M@Twit.abstract: muteOnLoad is a settable variable that determines if a Twitch Clip Player will be muted upon initialization.

Classes/TwitchClipPlayer.html#/c:@M@Twit.name: allowsFullScreen
Classes/TwitchClipPlayer.html#/c:@M@Twit.abstract: allowsFullScreen is a settable variable that determines if a Twitch Clip Player will allow full screen.

Classes/TwitchClipPlayer.html#/s:12Twitc.abstract: preloadSetting specifies whether or not this Clip Player should preload the loaded clip. Default: .auto.

Classes/TwitchClipPlayer.html.name: TwitchClipPlayer
Classes/TwitchClipPlayer.html.abstract: TwitchClipPlayer is a class that allows for the encapsulation of the loading of a non-interactive Twitch Clip

Classes/TwitchPlayer.html.name: TwitchPlayer
Classes/TwitchPlayer.html.abstract: TwitchPlayer is an embeddable Twitch Web Player. You can play Twitch Streams and Videos from a TwitchPlayer
